title: preparing for the future with this Bald Cypress #bonsai #japan #garden #workshop

tasks.task: Boarding haybine onto trailer.
subtasks: Approach the haybine.
Push the haybine onto the trailer.
Secure the haybine to the trailer.

tasks.task: Attaching implements to the front of the tractor.
subtasks: Position the plow in front of the tractor.
Connect the safety chain between the tractor and plow.
Lower the plow onto the ground.

tasks.task: Driving the tractor with the plow.
subtasks: Adjust speed of the tractor.
Negotiate turns while moving the plow.

tasks.task: Attaching the bale spear to the tractor.
subtasks: Position the bale spear on the front of the tractor.
Engage the bale spear mechanism.

tasks.task: Collecting bales with the bale spear.
subtasks: Drive tractor towards a stack of bales.
Lower the bale spear to pick up the bale.
Lift the bale and place it on the trailer.

tasks.task: Boarding the combine onto the trailer.
subtasks: Drive the combine towards the trailer.
Align the combine with the trailer's loading area.
Position the combine onto the trailer.

tasks.task: Towing the implement to the field.
subtasks: Secure the implement to the tractor.
Drive the tractor and implement to the field.

tasks.task: Planting corn with the planter.
subtasks: Insert seeds into the ground.
Cover the seeds with soil.
Adjust the planter's depth.

tasks.task: Spraying crops with chemical from the sprayer.
subtasks: Operate the chemical loading mechanism.
Drive the sprayer through the field.
Apply chemical to the crops as per the pattern.
